Wolfgang,

First, I saw no code.  If you attached it as a file, it is pro=
bably
being stripped.  You have two choices here, inline the code with the
=
message or put it in the 'Files' section of this group and let us know
wher=
e it is.

Now on to the point of the message:

Curious.  This is totally di=
fferent behavior, as you can see.  Here the
suite was invoked.  I see nothi=
ng in the trace to lead me to a
conclusion though.  However, about your cla=
sspath -- look in your
<jdk-install-directory>/lib/ext.  Is there a crimson=
.jar, xerces.jar, or
xercesImpl.jar?  If so, you will need to purge them.  =
The JDK 1.3
automatically takes anything in the lib/ext directory and prepe=
nds it to
your classpath.

Also, I assume you are using SUN's JDK.  Is that=
 so?

One other note, if you compile with debugging information you will ge=
t
the line number in the stack trace.

=3Djason
